00030 struct RecordId {
00034   PageId page_number;
00035 
00039   SlotId slot_number;
00040 
00047   bool operator==(const RecordId& rhs) const {
00048     return page_number == rhs.page_number && slot_number == rhs.slot_number;
00049   }
00050

00059   }
